3.11.1.4. systemmetadata.systemMetadata¶

systemmetadata.systemMetadata()¶

Returns a new, blank instance of SystemMetadata that can be modified and subsequently serialized to one of the supported formats.

Returns:Instance of SystemMetadata, blank
Return type:SystemMetadata
